strings.string: In rate mode this indicates the number of seconds between an alert. In this mode the range is 1-599. In Beats Per Minute mode this indicates the number of alerts to be played each minute. Although the range which may be input remains at 1-599 (as a limitation of ConnectIQ), the functional range for the datafield is 1-60 and the datafield will adjust dynamically to this range.

Select "no" to have the data field use vibration and/or tone alerts at all times when the data field is enabled for an activity (default); select "yes" to only have alerts active when the data field is in view on the watch screen.
Notify only when data field is visible
